TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ExportParameterKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Within the method that is marked with , specify the actual Java type of the corresponding parameter or return value in .

remarks.para: and are used to generate Java method and/or field explicitly in Android Callable Wrappers (ACWs), with specific name. Since Mono for Android maps more than one Java types to one managed type, the signature for the Java method that corresponds to an exported managed method cannot be determined without detailed specification. is used in such usage scenario, to indicate which Java type it is used in the generated code. This ExportParameterKind is the actual type specification.
For details, see ExportAttribute section of the documentation page.
This type is introduced in Mono for Android 4.2.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Java.Interop.ExportParameterKind InputStream = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the parameter or return type is java.lang.InputStream.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Java.Interop.ExportParameterKind OutputStream = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the parameter or return type is java.lang.OutputStream.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Java.Interop.ExportParameterKind Unspecified = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the parameter or return type is not specified. This is the default value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Java.Interop.ExportParameterKind XmlPullParser = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the parameter or return type is org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParser.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Java.Interop.ExportParameterKind XmlResourceParser = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the parameter or return type is android.content.res.XmlResourceParser.
